title: In-Depth ReactJS Tutorial Series
features: Developed a comprehensive ReactJS tutorial series with 15+ project modules, empowering 5,000+ developers through code and video lessons.
Implemented reusable component libraries and advanced state‑management patterns, reducing boilerplate by 25% and standardizing best practices across all projects.
Established CI pipelines and automated unit tests, achieving 92% code coverage and ensuring high code quality for an open‑source educational platform.
